body:
Yep, here's another walls video! The second one in two days! I'm getting more addicted to walls now, so I decided to do a nice little edit / speedup video which is just under 5 minutes! 

Hope you guys enjoyed this, and I'd love some feedback!! :)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OMiUFlM2O7Y

replies.body: That 99 guy got rent by a nub.

replies.body:
Great video and I enjoyed it!
One comment - I'd like to see it at normal speed.  The action was too fast for me and I didn't get to fully appreciate your gameplay.  Plus, I missed the iron block & diamond locations.
replies.body_tagged:
Great video and I enjoyed it!
One comment - I'd like to see it at normal speed.  The action was too fast for me and I didn't get to fully appreciate your gameplay.  Plus, I missed the iron block & diamond locations.

replies.body:
Thanks! Also, this is the first video that I've done in a while which is sped up. The video I uploaded right before this one was normal speed with commentary, and that one shows diamond locations and such if you're interested. :)
Thanks for the tip!

@Miguel Thanks buddy! :D
